content:
**Which graph shows a linear function with a domain of all real values of $x$?**


[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A linear function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The line has a very steep slope with arrows at the edge of the graph on either end.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/326f0283378d229497faade7c07bd65d6ba5bc54)

![A linear function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is a filled circle at the point (negative 10, 2) and a line to the right ending in an arrow at the right edge of the graph.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/bedfd5b5c5ad3c7fb1c63479c612ff314ff38b78)

![A linear function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is a filled circle at the point (10, 4) and a line to the left ending in an arrow at the left edge of the graph.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/30caa1f06ce8f2a3579d227991ab01af331b73fd)

![A linear function is graphed. The x and h of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is a filled circle at the point (negative 10, 2) and another filled circle at the point (10, 4). The line segment connects these two points.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/1ec23260df449642eb31a9ff27f193c97dcc0c6c)
